articles.author: Dominic Patten
articles.title: ‘Zero Day’ TV Review: Robert De Niro’s Netflix Political Thriller Fights To Make America Function Again - Deadline
articles.description: Ripped out of the underbelly of modern America as much as the headline, the Robert De Niro starring Zero Day will show it can happen here.
articles.content: “When is the last time the country was able to solve any of its problems?” ambitious Congresswoman Alexandra Mullen (Lizzy Caplin) screams at her father and former POTUS George Mullen (Robert De Niro… [+5673 chars]

articles.author: Kate Seamons
articles.title: The End Arrives for America's Sole Surviving Ocean Liner - Newser
articles.description: The SS United States sets sail for Alabama and then Florida, where it will be sunk
articles.content: A storied ocean liner that has spent nearly three decades rusting at port in Philadelphia set off on its final journey Wednesday. The SS United States' destination? The sea floor, ultimately. The shi… [+224 chars]
